title: Rosie the Riveter WWII Home Front National Historical Park: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around      Links And Information For Public Transportation  From Richmond Bart Station, take AC Transit bus # 74 (towards Harbour Way S & Ford Point) For the Rosie the Riveter Memorial in Marina Bay Park: get off at Regatta and Sea Drift Dr. (10-minute ride). Walk across Regatta Blvd into Marina Bay Park.  The memorial is on the left.  For the Visitor Center, continue on the #74 bus to its final stop at Ford Point (a 13-minute ride from the BART station). From there, walk along the water in front of the Ford Building, to find the NPS Visitor Center on the opposite side (east side) of the building.  Visit 511.org for bus schedules and help with.  For schedules, maps, fare information and trip-planning on public transit, please visit www.511.org and www.bart.gov .
